info.description: Allows the viewing and creation of Order Simulations
info.title: Order Simulations APIs

parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

responseCode.description: The user input to accept/reject the override.

accountId.description: The identifier of the account. Often referred to as the account number, yet for consistency this is always referred to as accountId.

contractType.description: Indicates if the position is related to Loan, Deposit ,FX-Forward/FX-Swap

callOrPut.description: Indicates whether the transaction is a call or put. CALL or PUT.

maturityDate.description: The delivery period or maturity date of the contract transacted

buyCurrency.description: The SWIFT code of the currency of the purchase

sellCurrency.description: The SWIFT code of the sold currency.

marketValueCurrency.description: Currency in which the market value for the associated position belongs to

marketValue.description: Market value for the associated position

marginValue.description: Margin value for the associated position

breachInformations.description: Contains the information about any breach on Collateral

breachInformation.description: Contains the information about any breach on Collateral

initialMarketValue.description: The initial market value for the portfolio before considering the new orders from the session.

initialMarginValue.description: The initial margin value for the portfolio before considering the new orders from the session.

initialLiabilityPosition.description: The initial liability value for the portfolio before considering new orders from the session.

initialCollateralSurplusDeficit.description: Collateral Surplus before considering the new orders from this session

newMarketValue.description: The market value for the portfolio after considering the new orders from the session.

newMarginValue.description: The margin value for the portfolio after considering the new orders from the session.

newLiabilityPosition.description: The liability value for the portfolio after considering the new orders from the session

collateralSurplusDeficit.description: Collateral Surplus after considering the new orders from the session

creditCheck.description: Set to yes if the Collateral Surplus Deficit is positive

collateralCheck.description: Checks the Collateral of the Portfolio

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

parse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS
